name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Developer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **Java 17**, **Dropwizard**, and **Restler**. Proficient in database management including **MongoDB**, **ClickHouse**, and **Redis**, with hands-on expertise in building distributed systems and implementing **Apache Kafka** and **Kafka Streams** for robust data processing. Strong knowledge of search technologies like **Elasticsearch** and **OpenSearch**. Skilled in cloud infrastructure deployment and management with a solid background in **CI/CD** practices and **Test Driven Development**. Experienced in enhancing system capabilities through **A/B Testing** to drive data-informed decision-making.

Brings analytical and problem-solving skills honed in complex environments like healthcare and finance, along with a commitment to team collaboration and empathetic communication. Adept at leveraging **Airflow** for workflow automation and operational efficiency, with a passion for creating secure and scalable backend solutions that meet industry standards.
